name: 22 Short Films About Springfield
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Richard Appel, David X. Cohen, Jonathan Collier, Jennifer Crittenden, Greg Daniels, Brent Forrester, Rachel Pulido, Steve Tompkins, Bill Oakley, Josh Weinstein, Matt Groening, Greg Daniels (with writing supervised by), Dan Greaney (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: A series of vignettes highlights a day in the life of various Springfield residents.
